Hub Responsibility to Forward VA Form 21P-555 to the Philadelphia Insurance Center
Hubs are responsible for forwarding copies of completed
VA Forms 21P-555
to the Philadelphia Insurance Center for the Philadelphia Insurance Centerâ€™s use in updating insurance records.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section C - General Information on Incompetency and Fiduciary Cases
